page.title: 14PETER FAIR OR RATHVEN MARKET
page.content: THERE IS A ROAD CALLED THE SMIDDY IN RATHVEN. IT TAKES YOU UP TO THE MARCH ROAD. IF YOU GO UP THE MARCH ROAD ON THE 3RD THURSDAY OR FRIDAY OF JULY, YOU START TO SEE LIGHTS AND YOU START TO HEAR MUSIC. AS YOU GO OVER THE HILL, THERE IT IS - PETER FAIR! USUALLY I GO WITH MY GRANNY AND GRANDAD BECAUSE I GET "HEAPS" OF MONEY WHEN I GO WITH THEM. THERE'S DODGEMS AND SHOOTING, KNOCKING DOWN COCONUTS AND CANS, THE TWISTER AND THE HELTER SKELTER AS WELL. I ALWAYS GO TO THE WALTZERS FIRST. I LIKE IT BECAUSE IT IS FAST. I LIKE THE TWISTER AS WELL BUT YOU HAVE TO HANG ON VERY TIGHT. I ALWAYS FEEL A LITTLE SICK AFTER THE TWISTER BUT VERY HAPPY. SOMETIMES WE LIKE TO GO TO ONE OF THE MANY ARCADES. WE LIKE A SHOT OF EVERYTHING BEFORE WE GO AND WHEN WE LEAVE WE ALWAYS BUY A SOUVENIR.
